1521.content:
Dogs the size of cars and horses the size of houses are just some of the size enhancements made to the animals on the Harkoch Farm. As a food producing farm and there are many advantages of having larger than natural animals. For example: the cows make more milk here than anywhere else and the sheep make more wool than what could ever be needed. Over all having a few large animals is more profitable than have a lot of normal sized ones.

One big problem here is that there is almost no automation so the farm employs a huge team of almost two hundred people to keep it working. With any big operation there are always draw backs and danger, the largest one is that the animals eat a lot and they leave behind a lot afterwards. Luckily their manure is used almost completely in the field or in other useful ways. So there's never really a problem with that part of the job. The feeding is the real danger as they'll eat just about anything that lands in their feeders. To date there has only ever been seven accidents reported where workers found themselves feeding the animals more literally than intended, but every now and then someone will go missing without explanations.

Apart from that slightly dark topic the farm is a great place to work and live. The food’s filling, the beds are comfortable, and the pay's amazing. So who are you on this farm?

With this level of trust comes an equally high level of responsibility, so don't go wilded with any ideas of fun and don't forget: everyone is replaceable.

Today however, you don't need to worry about being fired or otherwise removed from your job - yet - as you are busy at work...

Every building at the estate has a large wooden sign hanging from the front with white painted numbers on them to identify them for the guests. You say triumphantly in your head before heading towards the unmarked building. On the far side of the barn like structure you find a single door for something much larger than a person. 1523211121222112212222.content:
In the middle of the old barn, you see a huge bay mare laying down... well you assume she is bay. She is about 9 feet tall laying down. The mare is covered in mud and dirt. Her mane is all tangled up and matted. You assume that she looked quite nice when she wasn’t all dirty like this. She lifts her head and looks at you, her expression seems solemn. On the wall next to you, you see a plaque hanging on the wall, with only one bolt still in. You read it. It says:

Name: Misty
Sex: female
Species: horse (shire)
Color: bay
Born: 1990
Size: 42 hands (14 feet) to highest point of withers.
Information:
Was the first experiment on making a horse bigger than normal and rougher than normal. This was to provide the customer a hole new experience as most of the other horses are gentle. Instead Misty is gentler than the rest. She was used a couple of times before just being for show and then stopped even being for that. She also ages slower. At a rate of 1/4 a year per year.

She obviously is a lot bigger than the plaque said she is and is 28 years old. But if the plaque is right, she is actually only 6 years old. Misty stands up. You look up at her. She is truly massive. She is about 20-21 ft tall at the withers. Her head and neck adds another 8-10 feet onto her. She would be a beautiful specimen if she wasn’t so dirty. She looks down at you. Her eyes plead for you to help her. You look around for anything that would help and you see some grooming supplies. You don’t have any experience grooming any animals but you have watched videos and movies where people in them did that. Besides, Misty looks like she would accept any help she could get. She must’ve been wallowing in here for ages to get this dirty. Misty walks up to you and lowers her head down towards you. You start to panic, you are not that comfortable being in small confines with an animal over 10 times your size. But she doesn’t hurt you. She just looks you in the eyes. Do you help the poor mare?
1523211121222112212222.title: An Animal

15232111212221122122221.content:

You try to recall how to do this from the countless shows you’ve watched. You then pick up some supplies and get to work. You clean the mud off of the mare and you can see that the mare has some injuries that haven’t been treated. They are still painful for the horses as she stiffens up when you touch then. You groom her slowly and carefully so you don’t accidentally open any of her injuries. Overall, the process of grooming her is exactly as you would’ve imagined it, except she’s a lot bigger than the normal horse. You’ve always wanted a horse of your own and this feels as close as you will ever get to caring for one. You keep having to have the mare change positions so you can reach certain parts of her. It takes you a couple of hours due to the horse’s size. When you start to burst her tail though, she lifts it up a bit, just enough so that you can see her vulva wink at you. Then she lowers it. You stand still for a moment, her tail and your brush in hand. You are shocked by that act. She must really like you. You remember that her body is only 7 years old, so she is mature. Misty is staring back at you, waiting to see what you will do.
Will you:

Decline her offer.

info.brief_description: You have decided to visit a farm or maybe a ranch. Have fun with the animals.
info.description:
So today, you decided to visit a farm or possibly a ranch and get to see many different animals, or maybe just a few. No you're not the owner, your just there for reasons you choose aside from that. Actually you wake up on the farm, but why that is, you have to decide. Now there will be chapters that are where you are normal size, but others where you are shrunk. Also, you may not be the only one at the farm that woke up there.

The character can die, but don't stop the story there. Keep digestion and absorbtion scenes to a minimal

Things that are not Allowed:
1. Scat
2. Absorbstion/death in the womb or cock. (including regressing the main character to sperm stage or egg stage and never being born.
3. gay references or gay male animals. (Lesbian female animals are okay)
4. Hard Vore.
5. Blood and Gore.
6. Using loopholes around these rules.

Any chapters that disobey these rules will be deleted. I might change the rules as time goes on, so keep an eye out. Help me to get 50 chapters or more up. Have fun reading and adding chapters.
